title.text: Hydra: A Software System for Wordnet

abstractContent.text: This paper presents an overview of the software for wordnet processing Hydra.
The system has fully-fledged GUI and API, both working with powerful modal query language.
Hydra has been used for the development of the Bulgarian Word-Net for the last 7 years and recently was improved, became open source and is distributed as part of the Meta-Share platform .

introductionContent.text: During the development of Bulgarian WordNet (BulNet () at IBL 1 the need fora convenient and powerful tool for creating and processing wordnet arose.
Multiple applications of wordnet in various computational linguistics tasks suggested definition and implementation of API (Application Programing Interface) to work with Wordnet as well.

The presented system, Hydra, solved these problems, and provided additional benefits such as abstract mathematical query language, concurrent user access, undo / redo of user operations, synchronization between languages.
As part of the project CESAR 2 Hydra was improved, the range of the supported linguistic databases that it can work with was increased, configurability and use by end users was greatly facilitated.
Hydra's code was opened and is currently used by several teams working with wordnets for various languages like Croatian and Romanian.
